attributes.action: Hold a national referendum Hold a national referendum on whether the UK should ratify the European Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister Gordon Brown to hold a national referendum on the UK ratifying European Treaty.  This major change of European legislation will determine how the United Kingdom manages its internal affairs and policies. The public of the United Kingdom should be given the opportunity to either accept European rule or to be in control of their own futures.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
